```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
titanic <- read_csv(file = "titanic_MD.csv")
titanic %>% View()
summary(titanic)
library(stringr)
str_detect(
  string = titanic$Name, 
  pattern = "(Miss)|(Mrs)"
)
```
